topicTitle: place your funny ttt moments here

posts.postText:
ok so this morning i go on ttt and find sohi overclocking and destar, i tell them we should make the ufo, yes that map i forgot the name

the round starts i find out im traitor
 everyone helps me get it to work
but this is where shit happens
destar climbed ontop of my ufo and survived the bomb, im like fuck i cant kill him.

i couldnt drop my jihad and he called my bluff and laughed at me for being unable to get him, 

so what did i do, i bought a radio and played the c4 beep

while trying to avoid the "c4" he jumps and dies

he felt really stupid. :P

i should have prolly put this in the lulz thread fml
sorry
